title: CAP & Design
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018075439/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Publications](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018075439/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Publications) : CAP & Design**

**Publisher:** IDG Sweden  
**Editor:** Per Torberger  
**URL:** [http://www.capdesign.se](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018075439/http:/www.capdesign.se/ "http://www.capdesign.se")

CAP&Design is a [Swedish](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018075439/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sweden) trade journal for graphic designers and other professionals working with visual communication.
author: Textism
